enhanced_description: Tom Som Pla is a beloved soul-warming soup from southern Thailand that with a pleasant kick of heat. Sour and spicy fish soup with turmeric. This medium recipe takes about 25 minutes to prepare and represents the authentic flavors of Southern Thai cuisine features intense spices, seafood, and coconut-based curries. The combination of fish, turmeric, tamarind creates a harmonious blend that has made this dish a favorite among locals and visitors alike. Perfect for those seeking affordable authentic Thai cuisine.
